img_above_text:
![Five Skandhas \(7\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/c6/Five_Skandhas_%287%29.png)
When you get to the end, you'll see a pathway leading up to the right and white sacs to the left of it. Behind these sacs is a bridge that will take you down to where you want to go.
img_below_text:
Follow this to the end to be met with a Buddha's head and the monkey sitting on top of it. Approach, and the monkey will run off but you'll be able to collect the Skandha of Choice from the Buddha's head.
![Five Skandhas \(9\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/6c/Five_Skandhas_%289%29.png)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 12 from the file 'How_to_Find_the_Five_Skandhas_and_Unlock_a_Secret_Boss_.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Five Skandhas \(7\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/c6/Five_Skandhas_%287%29.png)
When you get to the end, you'll see a pathway leading up to the right and white sacs to the left of it. Behind these sacs is a bridge that will take you down to where you want to go."
            - Following Text: "Follow this to the end to be met with a Buddha's head and the monkey sitting on top of it. Approach, and the monkey will run off but you'll be able to collect the Skandha of Choice from the Buddha's head.
![Five Skandhas \(9\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/6c/Five_Skandhas_%289%29.png)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary:
1. **Summary of the Image**:  
The image shows a dark, rocky pathway in a cave-like environment. To the left, there are white, sac-like structures resembling organic growths, and to the right, a staircase leads upward. A character, armed with a staff, stands in the foreground, seemingly observing the path ahead. A red arrow points toward the staircase, indicating the intended direction of progress.

2. **Purpose, Content, or Narrative Role**:  
The image serves as a visual guide for navigating the environment in the game. It highlights the pathway the player should follow (up the stairs to the right) after encountering the white sacs. This is part of the journey to reach the Buddha's head and collect the Skandha of Choice, as described in the surrounding text.
